definition: to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father
according to/to act in accordance with/to depend on/to seize/to occupy

sentences.english: The textology of the Qing Dynasty is an old subject in the academic circle.
sentences.chinese: 清代考據學是學術界多次探討的老問題。

sentences.english: Dai Zhen was a unique scholar during the Qian- Jia time, who was expert at textual research and argumentation.
sentences.chinese: 戴震兼擅義理與考據，在乾嘉學術史上獨樹一幟。

sentences.english: During the Ch'ing dynasty k'ao-cheng scholars advocated a program to reconstruct missing sources from antiquity.
sentences.chinese: 在清代，考據學者倡導重建古代佚散文獻的計劃。

definition: to interpret and make glossaries and commentaries on classic texts
to make painstaking efforts (idiom); after much trouble/to work hard at sth
to comment/a point by point commentary
to master the subject via a comprehensive study of surrounding areas
study of classic texts, including interpretation, glossaries and commentaries
to add parallels and interpretations (to a story etc)/to develop and embellish/to interpret (often in a strained manner)
to read and re-read sth until one is familiar with it
